text: "My Way" is the fourth single off American nu metal band Limp Bizkit's third studio album Chocolate Starfish and the Hot Dog Flavored Water. The song was released on September 27, 2000. The song was nominated for a Kerrang! Award for Best Single. My Way was used as the theme song for WWF's WrestleMania X-Seven. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2001 songs Category:Limp Bizkit songs Category:Alternative rock songs
title: My Way (Limp Bizkit song)
